page.title: 07HOME LIFE - HOUSE PRICES
page.content:
As well as traditional houses in Musselburgh, the town has a number of new housing estates on the outskirts. Here is a sample of houses for sale during July 1985 and prices:
Offers over Detached Villa Â£47,000 (3 bedrooms and bathroom, garage and garden) End Terrace Villa Â£45,000 Detached Bungalow Â£40,000 Semi-detached Villa Â£38,000 Modern Terrace Villa Â£37,000 Semi detached Villa Â£36,000 Upper Flat Â£35,000 End Terrace Villa Â£34,250 (F) Ground Flat Â£34,000 Semi detached Villa Â£33,995 (F) End Villa on corner site Â£33,000 (F) Middle Terrace Villa Â£32,800 (F)
